variant.question: Which of the following statements is correct regarding RNAV/RNP navigation specifications and any requirements for on-board performance monitoring and alerting?

options.text: RNP specifications include the requirement for on-board performance monitoring and alerting.
RNP specifications include the requirement for ATC surveillance to alert the flight crew if systems performance does not comply.
RNAV specifications include the requirement for on-board performance monitoring and alerting.
RNAV specifications include the requirement for on-board and ground-based performance monitoring and alerting.

variant.question: To which performance does the concept of RNP apply?

options.text: To navigation performance within an airspace.
To navigation performance within an airspace using satellite navigation systems only.
To navigation performance on RNAV routes only.
To navigation performance within an airspace and a specific time-interval.
